title: Kinda Funny Becomes Ghost Hunters!
description:
On this Friday stream Mike, Nick, Andy, and Kevin become the official Kinda Funny ghost hunters in the newly released Midknight Ghost Hunt.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
